entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain beginning late this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2 except minus 2 in low lying areas. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 2 except minus 2 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023
